prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon that burrows underground and has a playful personality.
Imagine a trio of small creatures that work together to dig tunnels in the earth.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a mole and is known for its teamwork skills.
Generate a cute Pokemon with a round body shape and a friendly demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that is active in caves and has a knack for surprising its foes.
Give me a unique Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and loves to dig.
Make a small, adorable Pokemon that can create intricate tunnel systems underground.
